verses.verse: <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> how long will I <S%H7768>cry,<s%> and you will not <S%H8085>hear?<s%> I cry <S%H2199>out<s%> to <S%H2555>you<s%> "Violence!" and will you not <S%H3467>save?<s%>

Why do you <S%H7200>show<s%> me <S%H205>iniquity,<s%> and <S%H5027>look<s%> at <S%H5999>perversity?<s%> For <S%H7701>destruction<s%> and <S%H2555>violence<s%> are before <S%H7379>me.<s%> There is strife, and <S%H4066>contention<s%> rises <S%H5375>up.<s%>

Therefore the <S%H8451>law<s%> is <S%H6313>paralyzed,<s%> and <S%H4941>justice<s%> <S%H5331>never<s%> goes <S%H3318>forth;<s%> for the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H3803>surround<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous;<s%> therefore <S%H4941>justice<s%> goes <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H6127>perverted.<s%>

<S%H7200>"Look<s%> among the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> <S%H5027>watch,<s%> and <S%H8539>wonder<s%> <S%H8539>marvelously;<s%> for I am <S%H6466>working<s%> a <S%H6466>work<s%> in your <S%H3117>days,<s%> which you will not <S%H539>believe<s%> though it is told <S%H5608>you.<s%>

<S%H6965>For,<s%> behold, I raise up the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> that <S%H4751>bitter<s%> and <S%H4116>hasty<s%> <S%H1471>nation,<s%> that <S%H1980>march<s%> through the <S%H4800>breadth<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> dwelling places that are not <S%H4908>theirs.<s%>
They are <S%H366>feared<s%> and <S%H3372>dreaded.<s%> Their <S%H4941>judgment<s%> and their <S%H7613>dignity<s%> proceed from <S%H3318>themselves.<s%>

Their <S%H5483>horses<s%> also are <S%H7043>swifter<s%> than <S%H5246>leopards,<s%> and are more <S%H2300>fierce<s%> than the <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H2061>wolves.<s%> Their <S%H6571>horsemen<s%> press <S%H6335>proudly<s%> <S%H6571>on.<s%> Yes, their horsemen <S%H935>come<s%> from <S%H7350>afar.<s%> They <S%H5774>fly<s%> as an <S%H5404>eagle<s%> that <S%H2363>hurries<s%> to <S%H398>devour.<s%>
All of them <S%H935>come<s%> for <S%H2555>violence.<s%> Their <S%H4041>hordes<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> the <S%H6921>desert.<s%> He <S%H622>gathers<s%> <S%H7628>prisoners<s%> like <S%H2344>sand.<s%>

<S%H7046>Yes,<s%> he scoffs at <S%H4428>kings,<s%> and <S%H7336>princes<s%> are a <S%H4890>derision<s%> to <S%H7832>him.<s%> He laughs at every <S%H4013>stronghold,<s%> for he <S%H6651>builds<s%> up an <S%H6083>earthen<s%> <S%H3920>ramp,<s%> and takes it.
Then he <S%H2498>sweeps<s%> by like the <S%H7307>wind,<s%> and goes <S%H5674>on.<s%> He is indeed <S%H816>guilty,<s%> <S%H2098>whose<s%> <S%H3581>strength<s%> is his <S%H433>god.<s%>"

<S%H6924>Aren't<s%> you from everlasting, <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> my <S%H430>God,<s%> my Holy <S%H6918>One?<s%> We will not <S%H4191>die.<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> you have <S%H7760>appointed<s%> him for <S%H4941>judgment.<s%> <S%H6697>You,<s%> Rock, have <S%H3245>established<s%> him to <S%H3198>punish.<s%>

You who have <S%H2889>purer<s%> <S%H5869>eyes<s%> than to <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H7451>evil,<s%> and who <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> on <S%H5999>perversity,<s%> why do you <S%H5027>tolerate<s%> those who deal <S%H898>treacherously,<s%> and keep <S%H2790>silent<s%> when the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1104>swallows<s%> up the man who is more righteous than <S%H6662>he,<s%>
and <S%H6213>make<s%> <S%H120>men<s%> like the <S%H1709>fish<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea,<s%> like the creeping <S%H7431>things,<s%> that have no ruler over <S%H4910>them?<s%>

He takes <S%H5927>up<s%> all of them with the <S%H2443>hook.<s%> He <S%H1641>catches<s%> them in his <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H622>gathers<s%> them in his <S%H4365>dragnet.<s%> Therefore he <S%H8055>rejoices<s%> and is <S%H1523>glad.<s%>

Therefore he <S%H2076>sacrifices<s%> to his <S%H2764>net,<s%> and burns <S%H6999>incense<s%> to his <S%H4365>dragnet,<s%> because by <S%H1992>them<s%> his <S%H2506>life<s%> is <S%H8082>luxurious,<s%> and his <S%H2506>food<s%> is <S%H1277>good.<s%>
Will he therefore <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H7324>empty<s%> his <S%H2764>net,<s%> and <S%H2026>kill<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> without <S%H2550>mercy?<s%>
